Ingredients.1: 2 cups shredded cooked chicken, or more to taste

Ingredients.7: 1  jalapeno pepper, diced, or more to taste

Directions.1: Mix chicken with Mexican cheese blend, pimentos, green chiles, onion, mayonnaise, and jalapeno.

Directions.2: Place about 1 tablespoon of the mixture into the center of each empanada disc. Run a wet finger around the rim of each disc. Fold into a half-moon shape and press edges together with a fork to seal well.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.4: Fry 1 to 2 empanadas at a time in the hot oil until brown, 1 to 2 minutes per batch.
